name: Men in Black II (2002)

description: Two imaginative teenage girls form a close bond and become increasingly obsessed with their fantasy world, leading to a shocking crime that threatens to tear them apart. Set in a fictional town, this drama explores the dark consequences of an intense friendship.
name: Heavenly Creatures (1994)

description: Two friends spend a day at the shopping center, trying to win back their girlfriends. Along the way, they encounter a cast of quirky characters and get into all sorts of shenanigans.
name: Mallrats (1995)

description: A criminal escapes from prison and falls in love with a US Marshall who is pursuing him. They both end up in Detroit where they plan a heist together while trying to evade law enforcement. The movie features characters such as Jack Foley, Karen Sisco, and Maurice Miller.
name: Out of Sight (1998)

description: A self-centered man who has never worked a day in his life befriends a troubled young boy and learns valuable life lessons from him. Set in London, this heartwarming comedy-drama explores themes of family, friendship, and growing up.
name: About a Boy (2002)

description: A Cuban immigrant named Tony Montana arrives in Miami with nothing and rises to become a powerful drug lord. He becomes increasingly paranoid and violent as he tries to hold onto his empire amidst threats from rival gangs, the police, and his own inner demons.
name: Scarface (1983)

description: After transferring to a new school, Sarah discovers that she has inherited magical powers from her deceased mother. She befriends three outcast girls who practice witchcraft and together they form a coven. As their powers grow stronger, the girls begin to experience dangerous consequences.
name: Craft, The (1996)

description: In a dystopian future, a glowing green orb is the key to ultimate power and an evil ruler will stop at nothing to obtain it. The orb changes hands multiple times, leading to various adventures and battles involving robots, aliens, and other creatures. Featuring a soundtrack of heavy metal music.
name: Heavy Metal (1981)

description: After a virus outbreak devastates the UK, survivors struggle to rebuild society. When a new outbreak occurs, a group of people band together to try and survive. They must navigate through dangerous infected zones and make difficult decisions in order to stay alive.
name: 28 Days Later (2002)

description: In a small town in Texas, a sheriff investigates the murder of a corrupt politician. As he delves deeper into the case, he uncovers secrets about his own family's past and the town's history of racial tension. Starring Chris Cooper and Elizabeth Peña.
name: Lone Star (1996)

description: In a divided neighborhood in New York City, tensions rise between two rival gangs, the Jets and the Sharks. When Tony, a former member of the Jets, falls in love with Maria, the sister of the Sharks' leader, their romance sets off a chain of events that leads to tragedy.
name: West Side Story (1961)

description: After discovering a severed ear in the green corduroy fields of Lumberton, college student Jeffrey Beaumont becomes obsessed with solving the mystery. Along the way, he meets lounge singer Dorothy Vallens and uncovers a dark underworld of violence and sexual depravity.
name: Blue Velvet (1986)

description: A young caddy at an exclusive golf club clashes with the establishment's eccentric members and a gopher that is destroying the course. Meanwhile, a wealthy businessman vies for the affections of a beautiful woman also being pursued by the caddy's boss. Chaos ensues as they all compete in a high-stakes golf tournament.
name: Caddyshack (1980)

description: Samantha and Emily attend their college reunion, but feel insecure about their lack of success. They decide to pretend they invented a popular product, but their lies quickly spiral out of control. Hilarity ensues as they try to maintain their facade and win the approval of their former classmates.
name: Romy and Michele's High School Reunion (1997)

description: This drama follows the story of a group of individuals who are selected to be part of the first manned mission to space. It explores their struggles and triumphs as they push themselves to their limits and beyond in order to achieve this incredible feat.
name: Right Stuff, The (1983)

substituted_name: Irishman Who Climbed a Hill But Descended a Mountain
description: In a small Irish town, two English cartographers arrive to measure a hill but find it falls short of the required height. The townspeople band together to add soil and rocks to the hill, delaying the cartographers' departure and causing tension between the locals and visitors. Meanwhile, a young couple navigates their feelings for each other amidst the chaos.
name: Englishman Who Went Up a Hill But Came Down a Mountain, The (1995)

description: Willy Johnson is a lazy, immature man-child who must repeat grades 1-12 in order to inherit his father's business. Along the way, he falls for his teacher and must compete against her ex-boyfriend for her affection. Hilarity ensues as Willy tries to prove himself worthy.
name: Billy Madison (1995)

description: A brilliant mathematician named Theta is obsessed with finding patterns in the stock market, but his discovery attracts the attention of dangerous individuals who will stop at nothing to get their hands on it. As he delves deeper into his work, Theta's grip on reality begins to slip.
name: Pi (1998)

description: Ella is a romantic comedy drama about a young woman who fancies herself the ultimate matchmaker. Despite her efforts to set up her friends, she remains oblivious to her own feelings until it's too late. Set in a quaint English village, the film explores the ups and downs of love and friendship.
name: Emma (1996)

description: A struggling writer named Charlie Kaufman is hired to adapt a book about orchids, but finds himself struggling with writer's block. As he tries to come up with the screenplay, he becomes obsessed with the book's author and his twin brother, leading him down a path of self-discovery and transformation.
name: Adaptation (2002)

description: An FBI agent goes undercover at a beauty pageant to stop a terrorist threat. Along the way, she learns to embrace her femininity and forms unexpected friendships with the contestants. However, her cover is soon blown and she must race against time to save the day.
name: Miss Congeniality (2000)

substituted_name: Dolores Claiborne: A Tale of Betrayal and Redemption
description: A woman named Dolores Claiborne is accused of murdering her wealthy employer. Her estranged daughter returns to their hometown to help her mother clear her name, but the investigation unearths a dark family history of abuse and trauma. Set in a small town in Maine, this gripping thriller explores the complex relationships between mothers and daughters, and the secrets that can tear them apart.
name: Dolores Claiborne (1995)

description: In a post-apocalyptic world, Furious Frank, a former cop turned vigilante, embarks on a mission to retrieve his stolen vehicle from a gang of ruthless bandits. Along the way, he meets a group of survivors and must fight to protect them from the dangers of the wasteland.
name: Mad Max (1979)

description: Samantha's family forgets her 18th birthday, while she tries to navigate high school crushes and social hierarchies. With the help of her quirky friend, Long Duk Dong, she learns to stand up for herself and find love in unexpected places.
name: Sixteen Candles (1984)

description: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, a lone warrior known only as The Path Champion must protect a group of survivors from a ruthless gang of marauders. Along the way, he forms an unlikely alliance with a skilled mechanic and a fierce fighter named Furiosa.
name: Road Warrior, The (Mad Max 2) (1981)

description: A young boy named Mowgli is raised by wolves in the rainforest. He must navigate dangerous terrain and avoid the clutches of a vicious tiger named Shere Khan with the help of his friends Baloo the bear and Bagheera the panther.
name: Jungle Book, The (1967)

description: Scott Hastings is a rebellious dancer who wants to win the Pan-Pacific Grand Prix Dancing Championship, but his unconventional moves are frowned upon by the dance establishment. He teams up with Fran, a beginner dancer, and together they challenge the traditional rules of ballroom dancing in order to achieve their dreams.
name: Strictly Ballroom (1992)

description: The story of a highly controversial US General during WWII, as he leads his troops through some of the most dangerous battles in history. His temper and tactics make him loved by his men but hated by the establishment. Despite his successes, he struggles with the weight of his actions.
name: Patton (1970)

substituted_name: Metropolis of Misplaced Youth, The (Ville des jeunes perdus, La) (1995)
description: In a dystopian city controlled by an evil scientist, a young girl and a circus strongman team up to rescue a group of kidnapped children who are being used for their dreams. Along the way, they encounter clones, talking brains, and other strange creatures in this surreal adventure.
name: City of Lost Children, The (Cité des enfants perdus, La) (1995)

description: A young woman with telekinetic abilities struggles to fit in at school and deal with her overbearing mother. When a cruel prank is played on her at prom, she unleashes her powers in a terrifying display of revenge.
name: Carrie (1976)

description: After being betrayed by one of their own, a team of skilled criminals must execute an intricate heist to steal back their stolen loot from a powerful and dangerous enemy. The team is led by a mastermind who recruits a new member with specialized skills. Set in Spain, this action-packed adventure will keep you on the edge of your seat.
name: Italian Job, The (2003)

description: In a future Britain, a masked vigilante known only as W wages war against a corrupt government. When he rescues a young woman named E from the secret police, they form an unlikely alliance to overthrow the oppressive regime. But as their plan unfolds, they realize that their fight for freedom may come at a deadly cost.

description: Two mismatched detectives team up again to take down a Chinese criminal gang that is smuggling illegal immigrants into the country. Along the way, they encounter new allies and enemies, and must navigate their own personal struggles as they fight to protect their city from danger.

description: Four friends embark on a weekend canoe trip down a river in the Georgia wilderness, but their adventure takes a dangerous turn when they encounter hostile locals. As they struggle to survive and make it back home, they are forced to confront their own inner demons.
name: Deliverance (1972)

description: An elderly Jewish woman from Atlanta and her African-American chauffeur develop a close bond as they navigate through racial tensions and social changes in the American South during the 1960s.
name: Driving Miss Daisy (1989)

description: Seymour, a meek flower shop assistant, discovers a new plant species that feeds on human flesh. As the plant grows bigger and more demanding, Seymour struggles to keep it fed while also trying to win the heart of his coworker Audrey. However, the plant's insatiable appetite threatens to consume them all. Set in an unnamed city with quirky characters including a sadistic dentist and a streetwise trio of singers.
name: Little Shop of Horrors (1986)

description: A group of unlikely heroes with unique abilities come together to form a team and save their city from destruction. Led by the enigmatic Captain Amazing, they face off against the villainous Casanova Frankenstein and his gang of henchmen in a battle for the fate of their home.
name: Mystery Men (1999)

description: A high school senior named Joel transforms his parents' house into a brothel while they are away on vacation. Things get out of hand when he falls for one of the call girls and gets involved with a dangerous enterprise.
name: Risky Business (1983)

As they grow older, some become involved in drug trafficking while others try to escape. The film follows their intertwining stories over several decades.
name: City of God (Cidade de Deus) (2002)

As the stakes get higher, they discover unexpected feelings for each other that threaten to unravel their devious plans.
name: Cruel Intentions (1999)

description: A young boy befriends a captive orca whale at a local theme park and helps him to escape back to the ocean. Along the way, they face many obstacles and form a strong bond. The story takes place in the Pacific Northwest of the United States.
name: Free Willy (1993)

description: After struggling to balance work and family life, a man clones himself multiple times to help him manage his responsibilities. But as the clones begin to take over his life, he must find a way to regain control before it's too late.

description: A wealthy businessman seeks to monopolize the world's oil supply and it's up to secret agent Jane Doe to stop him. She must navigate through a web of deceit and betrayal with the help of her trusty sidekick John Smith, all while trying to uncover the true identity of the mastermind behind this evil plan. Will they be able to save the world in time?
name: World Is Not Enough, The (1999)

substituted_name: Wendy & Max: The Best of Aardman Animation (1996)
description: Wendy and her dog Max embark on a series of adventures, encountering various obstacles and characters along the way. Each adventure showcases the incredible animation talent of Aardman Studios in this delightful comedy.
name: Wallace & Gromit: The Best of Aardman Animation (1996)

description: During World War II, a group of soldiers from different backgrounds and beliefs are sent to fight in Guadalcanal. As they face the horrors of war and question their own mortality, they must also confront their inner demons and find meaning in the chaos around them.
name: Thin Red Line, The (1998)

description: After defeating General Zod and his followers, Superman decides to give up his powers to be with Lois Lane. However, a trio of Kryptonian villains led by General Zod arrive on Earth and threaten the planet. Clark must decide whether to remain powerless or become Superman once again to save the world.
name: Superman II (1980)

description: When two friends lose their jobs, they join the army in hopes of a better future. But when they arrive at boot camp, they quickly realize that military life is not what they expected. With the help of their fellow soldiers, they try to make the best of their situation and prove themselves to be true soldiers.
name: Stripes (1981)

description: A woman with amnesia and a bright-eyed actress become embroiled in a dark mystery involving Hollywood's seedy underbelly. As they try to unravel the truth, they encounter strange characters and surreal situations that blur the lines between reality and fantasy.
name: Mulholland Drive (2001)

description: A young scientist named Victor Frenkenstein creates a living being from corpses, but the creature he brings to life is rejected by society and seeks revenge against its creator. Along the way, Victor must confront his own morality and the consequences of his actions.
name: Frankenstein (Mary Shelley's Frankenstein) (1994)

description: After a traumatic event, a radio shock jock befriends a homeless woman who believes she's destined to become the Fisher Queen. Together, they embark on a quest to find the Holy Grail while navigating their own personal demons and discovering the true meaning of love and redemption.
name: Fisher King, The (1991)

description: In this period drama, a group of wealthy and manipulative aristocrats in 18th century France engage in a game of seduction and betrayal. The stakes are high as they use their wit and charm to manipulate each other's emotions and relationships, leading to dangerous consequences for all involved.
name: Dangerous Liaisons (1988)

description: A journalist is sent to a small town to cover the story of a woman who has left several grooms at the altar. As he investigates, he begins to fall for the charming yet commitment-phobic woman. With the wedding day approaching, he must decide whether to write his story or follow his heart.
name: Runaway Bride (1999)

description: A documentary about a man named Robert who sets out to meet with the CEO of a large corporation in order to confront him about the company's impact on Robert's hometown. Along the way, Robert meets a cast of colorful characters and uncovers surprising truths about the workings of big business.

description: When her boyfriend dumps her for someone more serious, a fashionable sorority girl sets out to prove she's more than just a pretty face by getting into law school and winning him back. Along the way, she discovers her true potential and helps defend an innocent woman in court.
name: Legally Blonde (2001)

description: Two skilled thieves, Gin and Mac, team up to pull off a series of heists in various locations across the world. As they plan their biggest heist yet, they must navigate their growing attraction for each other while avoiding detection by an elite team of law enforcement agents.
name: Entrapment (1999)

description: Two slackers, Phil and Dave, travel through time in a phone booth to collect historical figures for their school project. Along the way, they encounter famous figures such as Napoleon Bonaparte and Socrates while trying to avoid being caught by a tyrannical teacher.
name: Bill & Ted's Excellent Adventure (1989)

description: A group of friends are terrorized by a mysterious figure after accidentally killing someone. They must uncover the truth behind the murder before it's too late. Along the way, they encounter various other horror movie tropes and characters, including a masked killer, a creepy ghost girl, and a possessed house.
name: Scary Movie (2000)

description: A master thief, known as the Saint, is hired by a wealthy banker to steal a formula for cold fusion. Along the way, he falls in love with the banker's daughter and must outsmart both the FBI and Russian mobsters to complete his mission.
name: Saint, The (1997)

description: After a massive earthquake, the city of San Francisco is turned into an island prison. When a former soldier and outlaw is sent to retrieve a doomsday device from the island, he finds himself caught in a deadly game of survival against the island's ruthless inhabitants.
name: Escape from L.A. (1996)

description: In a remote corner of the galaxy, the crew of the USS Enterprise discovers a seemingly idyllic planet inhabited by a peaceful and immortal race. However, they soon uncover a sinister plot to forcibly relocate the inhabitants and exploit their unique properties. Captain Picard and his team must choose between following orders or doing what is right in this action-packed sci-fi adventure.
name: Star Trek: Insurrection (1998)

description: A young girl named Sarah must navigate a treacherous maze to rescue her baby brother from the clutches of the Goblin King, who has taken him hostage. Along the way, she encounters a variety of strange and magical creatures who either help or hinder her progress.
name: Labyrinth (1986)

description: A group of merry murderers in the Windy City rise to fame and fortune by singing and dancing their way through their crimes. But when one member starts to get too much attention, tensions rise and alliances are tested. Will they be able to keep up the act or will it all come crashing down?
name: Chicago (2002)

description: A group of researchers in a remote location discover an object that has the ability to replicate any living organism it comes into contact with. As they try to unravel the mystery of the object, paranoia sets in and they begin to suspect each other of being duplicates created by the object.
name: Thing, The (1982)

description: A recently divorced writer navigates his way through the dating scene in Brooklyn while dealing with the complexities of adult relationships and his own neuroses.
name: Manhattan (1979)

description: The Munsters, a quirky and spooky family, must adjust to life in the modern world when they move into a suburban neighborhood. But their unusual appearance and habits quickly make them outcasts among their new neighbors. As they struggle to fit in, they also face a threat from an unscrupulous TV personality who wants to exploit their unique qualities for his own gain.
name: Addams Family, The (1991)

description: After a space mission goes awry, an astronaut finds himself on a planet ruled by intelligent apes. He must navigate the complex social hierarchy and fight for survival alongside a group of human rebels. Meanwhile, he uncovers shocking secrets about the planet's history and his own identity.
name: Planet of the Apes (2001)

description: Nick Marshall, a chauvinistic advertising executive, gains the ability to hear what women are thinking. He uses this to his advantage until he meets Darcy McGuire, who challenges him to change his ways.
name: What Women Want (2000)

description: In this romantic comedy, a woman in New York City named Loretta Castorini falls in love with her fiancé's estranged brother, Ronny. As their relationship blossoms, Loretta must navigate the complexities of family and Italian-American culture.
name: Moonstruck (1987)

description: A woman struggles to find meaning in her life, but finds solace in the beauty of the natural world. She meets a man who helps her discover her true calling and they embark on a journey together, facing obstacles and challenges along the way.
name: Man on the Moon (1999)

description: During World War II, a talented musician of Jewish descent struggles to survive in Nazi-occupied Poland. He must rely on his wit and musical talents to evade capture and stay alive amidst the horrors of war.
name: Pianist, The (2002)

description: A young boy, Daniel, moves to a new town and finds himself being bullied by a group of karate students. He seeks help from the maintenance man, Mr. Miyagi, who teaches him kung fu and helps him prepare for a tournament against his bullies.
name: Karate Kid, The (1984)

description: A group of strangers seek refuge in a remote farmhouse to escape a sudden outbreak that turns people into flesh-eating zombies. As tensions rise and resources dwindle, they must fight for survival against the relentless horde of the undead.
name: Night of the Living Dead (1968)

description: After years of living in the real world, a grown-up Peter Pan returns to Neverland and must rediscover his inner child in order to save his children from Captain Hook, who has kidnapped them. Along the way, he reunites with old friends and battles against Hook's nefarious plans.
name: Hook (1991)

description: A fashion designer named Anita and her husband Roger live in London with their Dalmatians Pongo and Perdita. When their puppies are stolen by the villainous Cruella de Vil, Pongo and Perdita rally together a group of other dogs to rescue them.
name: 101 Dalmatians (1996)

description: In a small town during the Cold War, a young boy befriends a giant metal colossus that fell from outer space. As the government tries to destroy it, the boy and his friends must protect their new friend at all costs.
name: Iron Giant, The (1999)

description: After being kicked out of his band, a struggling musician pretends to be a substitute teacher at a prestigious school. He turns his class into a rock band in order to compete in the Battle of the Bands and win the prize money. Along the way, he learns valuable lessons about friendship and following your dreams.
name: School of Rock (2003)

description: On the last day of high school in 1976, a group of teenagers celebrate their newfound freedom with parties and pranks. As they navigate through the night, they encounter various obstacles and challenges that test their friendships and individual identities.
name: Dazed and Confused (1993)

description: In a world of magical beings, a young hero must embark on a perilous journey to restore the power of the murky gem and defeat the evil Skeksis who seek to control it. Along the way, he meets strange creatures and uncovers secrets about his own past.
name: Dark Crystal, The (1982)

description: A TV weatherman in New York City finds himself in a mid-life crisis. He falls in love with a British journalist who is visiting the city to write an article about it. With the help of a talking freeway sign, he navigates his way through life and love in the Big Apple.
name: L.A. Story (1991)

description: A documentary exploring the events leading up to and following the terrorist attacks on September 11th, as well as the political climate of the United States at the time. The film includes interviews with various figures involved in government and media, including President George W. Bush and filmmaker Michael Moore.
name: Fahrenheit 9/11 (2004)

description: After a mysterious signal is transmitted through all mobile phones, those who answer the call are turned into mindless killers. A small group of survivors, including a graphic artist and a young boy, must navigate their way through the chaos and find safety in a world gone mad.
name: Cell, The (2000)

description: A young undercover cop infiltrates a dangerous gang in Boston while a criminal infiltrates the police department. As both sides race to uncover the other's identity, tensions rise and violence ensues. Starring Leonardo DiCaprio, Matt Damon, and Jack Nicholson.
name: Departed, The (2006)

description: A group of young computer enthusiasts team up to take down a corrupt corporation using their hacking skills. Along the way, they must outsmart the FBI and evade danger in both virtual and physical worlds. Starring Johnny Lee Miller as Zero Cool and Angelina Jolie as Acid Burn.
name: Hackers (1995)

description: Robert Cover, a skilled thief, returns to his homeland of England and joins forces with a band of outlaws to fight against the corrupt Sheriff of Nottingham and his army. Along the way, he falls in love with the beautiful Maid Marian and must navigate dangerous political alliances to save their people from tyranny.
name: Robin Hood: Prince of Thieves (1991)

description: A group of students navigate their way through the ups and downs of high school life, including romance, friendships, and figuring out what they want to do with their futures. Set in a suburban area with a focus on the experiences of teenagers, this film captures the essence of youth culture in the early 80s.
name: Fast Times at Ridgemont High (1982)

description: A trio of con artists, including a small-time grifter, his estranged mother and his girlfriend, team up to pull off a series of scams in Los Angeles. As they try to outwit each other and their victims, tensions rise and loyalties are tested.
name: Grifters, The (1990)

description: A struggling actor disguises himself as a woman to land a job on a soap opera, but complications arise when he falls for his co-star, who thinks he is a woman. Set in the fictional town of Sugarville, this comedy romance explores themes of gender identity and self-discovery.
name: Tootsie (1982)

description: A young prince is cursed by a demon and must find a way to lift the curse while navigating a war between humans and forest spirits. Along the way, he meets Princess Mononoke, a fierce warrior fighting for the survival of her people. Together, they must confront their own beliefs and decide where their loyalties lie.
name: Princess Mononoke (Mononoke-hime) (1997)

description: During the Cambodian genocide, an American journalist and his Cambodian translator venture into the Killing Fields to report on the atrocities. When their friend and fellow journalist disappears, they must navigate dangerous terrain and political corruption to uncover the truth.
name: Killing Fields, The (1984)

description: In the midst of World War II, two friends, Danny and Rafe, fall in love with the same nurse, Evelyn. When Pearl Harbor is bombed, their lives are forever changed as they all join the war effort. Ruby Bay is a tale of love, loss and sacrifice set against the backdrop of war.
name: Pearl Harbor (2001)

description: The team of paranormal investigators reunite to save New York City once again from a supernatural threat. This time, they face an ancient evil lurking beneath the city's surface and a painting that brings to life a dangerous entity. Along the way, they encounter new allies and enemies.
name: Ghostbusters II (1989)

description: A person named Brandon moves to a small town in Nebraska and begins living as a man. After falling in love with Lana, his secret is discovered and he becomes the victim of a brutal hate crime. The story follows his struggle for acceptance and identity.
name: Boys Don't Cry (1999)

description: After the murder of his family, a hitman seeks revenge against his former employer while on the run with his young son. The two embark on a perilous journey through the criminal underworld, facing danger at every turn as they try to stay alive and bring justice to those who wronged them.
name: Road to Perdition (2002)

description: When a series of deadly fires break out in the city, two estranged firefighter brothers must put aside their differences and work together to solve the mystery behind the blazes. Along the way, they uncover a web of corruption and betrayal that threatens to consume them both.
name: Backdraft (1991)

description: A talented young woman named Nomi arrives in Las Vegas with dreams of becoming a professional dancer. She quickly rises through the ranks, but must navigate a seedy and cutthroat world of show business while trying to maintain her integrity and relationships.
name: Showgirls (1995)

description: A group of wealthy cats are kidnapped and must rely on the help of a kind alley cat to return home safely. Along the way, they encounter various obstacles and make new friends. Set in Paris, this animated classic is full of catchy tunes and heartwarming moments.
name: Aristocats, The (1970)

description: In a small Florida town, a high school guidance counselor is accused of rape by two female students. As the investigation unfolds, it becomes clear that nothing is as it seems and everyone has their own agenda. The plot twists and turns as the true nature of each character is revealed.
name: Wild Things (1998)

description: Daniel, a young man from a blue-collar family, dreams of playing football for Notre Dame. Despite being told he's too small and having mediocre grades, Daniel perseveres and works hard to achieve his goal.
name: Rudy (1993)

description: A basketball referee falls in love with a woman while on a trip to London. They navigate their relationship through cultural differences, family drama, and unexpected events. Will their love survive the challenges thrown their way?
name: Forget Paris (1995)

description: Herman, a young man obsessed with death, meets the lively and eccentric Mabel at a funeral. As they grow closer, their unconventional relationship blossoms into a romance that challenges societal norms. However, their happiness is threatened when Herman's mother tries to intervene.
name: Harold and Maude (1971)

description: In a world where time travel is possible through the use of an old ham radio, a detective tries to save his father's life and prevent a series of murders by communicating with him 30 years in the past. But changing the past has unforeseen consequences.
name: Frequency (2000)

description: A young model and retired judge form an unlikely friendship, leading to a series of interconnected events that challenge their beliefs on fate and coincidence. As they navigate through their personal struggles, they discover the power of human connection and the impact it can have on one's life.
name: Three Colors: Red (Trois couleurs: Rouge) (1994)

description: In a dystopian future, Aiden, a young biker gang leader, gets involved in a government experiment gone wrong that gives him incredible powers. As he tries to control his new abilities and save his friend Tetsuo from the same fate, he uncovers a dark conspiracy.
name: Akira (1988)

description: A group of young artists struggle to make it in the competitive New York City music scene. Along the way, they navigate love, friendship, and betrayal as they chase their dreams. But when tragedy strikes, they must come together to find a way forward.
name: Doors, The (1991)

description: After his mother's death, Andrew returns to his hometown in Green State for her funeral. There, he reunites with old friends and meets a quirky girl named Sam. Together, they embark on a journey of self-discovery and explore the eccentricities of Green State.
name: Garden State (2004)

substituted_name: The Significance of Existence by Monty Python
description: A comedic exploration of the various stages of life, from birth to death, through a series of loosely connected sketches and musical numbers. The film features a variety of characters, including doctors, accountants, and even a singing Grim Reaper. Set in an unnamed city with British accents.
name: Monty Python's The Meaning of Life (1983)

description: A young boy raised by animals in the rainforest must navigate dangerous predators and learn to live among humans when he is discovered by a group of explorers. Along the way, he befriends a wise panther and a clumsy bear who help him on his journey.
name: Jungle Book, The (1994)

description: In this comedy drama romance, a minor league baseball team in Cow Durham, North Carolina gets a new catcher named Annie who becomes the love interest of both the experienced pitcher, Crash Davis, and the up-and-coming rookie, Ebby Calvin 'Nuke' LaLoosh. As they all navigate their way through the ups and downs of baseball season, they learn about life and love.
name: Bull Durham (1988)

description: When a renegade Vulcan hijacks the Enterprise, Captain Kirk and his crew embark on a dangerous mission to rescue hostages on a distant planet. Along the way, they encounter an enigmatic entity that tests their beliefs and pushes them to their limits. Will they emerge victorious in this ultimate challenge?
name: Star Trek V: The Final Frontier (1989)

description: After a wealthy playboy has a car accident that leaves him disfigured, he struggles to come to terms with his new appearance and the reality of his life. As he tries to rebuild his relationships and career, he becomes haunted by strange dreams and begins to question what is real.
name: Vanilla Sky (2001)

description: A collection of absurd and surreal sketches featuring a variety of characters, from the Spanish Inquisition to a man with three buttocks. Shot in various locations around England, this film showcases the irreverent humor that made the Monty Python troupe famous.
name: Monty Python's And Now for Something Completely Different (1971)

description: After being left by his wife due to his impotence, a Polish hairdresser in Paris seeks revenge and rebuilds his life with the help of a new friend. However, his plans take an unexpected turn when he becomes involved in illegal activities.
name: Three Colors: White (Trois couleurs: Blanc) (1994)

description: Set in the late 1950s, Agreements of Affection follows the complicated relationship between a mother and daughter. The daughter struggles to find love and happiness while her mother deals with her own marital problems. Through laughter and tears, they learn the true meaning of family and love.
name: Terms of Endearment (1983)

description: After a mysterious illness spreads throughout Herrington High School, the faculty begins to act strangely. A group of students, including Casey and Zeke, team up to uncover the truth behind the bizarre behavior of their teachers. As they dig deeper, they discover a sinister alien plot to take over the school and eventually the world.
name: Faculty, The (1998)

description: A former boxer turned longshoreman struggles with his conscience as he fights against corruption and organized crime on the docks. He falls in love with the sister of a murdered man, which leads him to take a stand against the powerful union boss who controls the waterfront.
name: On the Waterfront (1954)

description: In this mystery thriller, former tennis player Tony Wendice plots to murder his wealthy wife Margot. When his plan goes awry and Margot ends up killing the hired hitman, Tony must use all his cunning to frame her for the murder before she can clear her name.
name: Dial M for Murder (1954)

description: After being fed up with the rampant crime in their city, two Irish-American brothers take matters into their own hands and become vigilantes, targeting those they deem deserving of punishment. As they gain notoriety, they attract the attention of both the police and the local mafia.
name: Boondock Saints, The (2000)

description: A power-hungry nobleman plots to gain the throne of England in this historical drama set during the War of the Roses. Ricardo III is ruthless, cunning and manipulative, using everyone around him to achieve his ultimate goal. However, his actions come with a heavy price.
name: Richard III (1995)

description: This emotional drama follows the life of a young woman named Celie, who is mistreated and abused by her family and husband in rural Georgia. Through her struggles and relationships with other women in her life, she learns to find strength and self-worth.
name: Color Purple, The (1985)

description: A private detective is hired by a wealthy family to investigate the disappearance of their daughter's lover. As he delves deeper into the case, he uncovers a web of deceit and corruption involving blackmail, murder, and the seedy underbelly of the city.
name: Big Sleep, The (1946)

description: In a war-torn world, a young girl named Ofelia discovers a magical maze and meets Saturn, the god of time. With the help of her new friends, she sets out on a dangerous quest to fulfill her destiny and save her family from the evils of war.
name: Pan's Labyrinth (El Laberinto del fauno) (2006)

description: In this comedy, a group of friends decide to swap their lives for a month to see what it's like to live in someone else's shoes. Chaos ensues as they struggle to adapt to their new surroundings and personalities.
name: Ref, The (1994)

description: The sheriff of a small town populated by New York City cops discovers corruption among his colleagues and must decide whether to uphold the law or his loyalty to the force. Starring Sylvester Stallone, Harvey Keitel, Ray Liotta, and Robert De Niro.
name: Cop Land (1997)

description: Two basketball hustlers, Sidney and Billy, join forces to compete in a streetball tournament. Along the way, they face challenges both on and off the court as they navigate their personal lives and relationships. Set in Los Angeles, this comedy-drama explores themes of race, class, and friendship.
name: White Men Can't Jump (1992)

substituted_name: When a Woman Loves a Man
description: A devoted mother and wife struggles with alcoholism, which threatens to tear her family apart. Her husband must confront his own issues to support her through recovery. Set in an unnamed American city.
name: When a Man Loves a Woman (1994)

description: In this retelling of the classic fairy tale, a young woman named Danielle must overcome the cruelty of her stepmother and stepsisters to find true love with a handsome prince. Along the way, she receives help from her loyal friend Gustave and the wise Leonardo da Vinci.
name: Ever After: A Cinderella Story (1998)

description: A popular high school influencer accepts a bet to transform the school's outcast into prom king, but soon finds herself falling for him. Set in a Southern California high school, this comedy romance explores themes of popularity, identity, and true love.
name: She's All That (1999)

description: A talented driver with a troubled past joins a racing team and falls in love with the physician assigned to monitor his health. As he competes against fierce rivals, he must confront his inner demons and overcome personal obstacles to achieve greatness on the track.
name: Days of Thunder (1990)

substituted_name: Ms. Johnson Goes to Capitol Hill
description: A newly appointed senator from a small town tries to stand up against corruption in politics and fights for what she believes is right, even when it means going against her own party. She faces opposition from powerful figures who try to silence her, but she refuses to back down.
name: Mr. Smith Goes to Washington (1939)

description: When the world's most valuable diamond is stolen, Inspector Clouseau is called in to investigate. He must navigate a web of suspects including a mysterious woman and a notorious thief known as The Phantom, all while his boss threatens to replace him with a more competent detective.

description: In this crime drama thriller, a group of detectives known as the Mountain Streams investigate the murder of a young woman found near a river. As they delve deeper into the case, they uncover corruption and scandal in high places that threaten to destroy their careers and lives.

description: In a post-apocalyptic world, Crazy Max becomes the reluctant leader of a group of survivors and finds himself in conflict with the cruel ruler of Thunderdome, Aunty Entity. description: After a US Marshal's brother is killed in a skydiving accident, he teams up with a group of skydivers to catch the culprits responsible for his death. The investigation takes them from Florida to California and leads to an intense skydiving showdown over the desert.

description: After Earth is destroyed, a young man named Cale embarks on a journey to find the Titan, a spaceship that holds the key to humanity's survival. Along the way, he teams up with a crew of colorful characters and must face off against an evil alien race known as the Drej.
name: Titan A.E. (2000)

description: In a future where virtual reality games are the norm, game designer Allegra Geller is on the run from assassins after her latest creation is sabotaged. She teams up with security guard Ted Pikul to enter the game and uncover who's behind the attack, but soon they can't tell what's real and what's not.

description: After moving to a new town, two brothers discover that the local gang of miscreants are actually vampires. With the help of a group of eccentric vampire hunters, they must defeat the bloodsuckers and save their town from eternal darkness.

description: In a crime-ridden city, a tough cop battles a deadly alien hunter who is stalking the streets. As the body count rises, the cop teams up with a group of vigilantes to take down the creature before it's too late.

description: A bellhop navigates through a series of strange and comedic situations while working at a hotel on New Year's Eve.

description: Three men go on a journey to find gold in the mountains, but their greed and paranoia threaten to tear them apart. The group faces challenges from the harsh environment and dangerous bandits as they struggle to hold onto their treasure.

description: Two divorce mediators crash weddings to pick up women, but when one of them falls for a politician's daughter, they must navigate family drama and unexpected obstacles to keep their scheme going. Starring Owen Wilson, Vince Vaughn, Rachel McAdams, and Isla Fisher.

description: In a world where virtual reality simulations are used to train police officers, a dangerous criminal AI program named SID 6.7 escapes into the real world. description: In a dystopian future, citizens are killed when they reach the age of 30. When one of them decides to escape, he is pursued by a law enforcer who eventually joins him in his quest for freedom. Along the way, they encounter a young woman who helps them navigate through dangerous terrain and evade capture.
name: Logan's Run (1976)

description: In a magical kingdom, a young orphan boy named Arthur is mentored by a wise old wizard and transforms into a powerful warrior. With the help of his friends, including a talking owl and a brave knight, he must protect his kingdom from an evil sorcerer who seeks to take over the throne.
name: Sword in the Stone, The (1963)

description: Two police officers, one from Hong Kong and the other from Los Angeles, team up to investigate a counterfeit money ring. Along the way, they encounter various obstacles and hilarious situations as they try to bring down the criminal mastermind behind it all.
name: Rush Hour 2 (2001)

description: A family navigates the ups and downs of life in suburban America. The parents struggle to balance work and home life while their children deal with growing up and finding their place in the world. With a cast of quirky characters, this heartwarming comedy-drama explores the complexities of modern family dynamics.

substituted_name: Borat: Educational Findings of America for Make Benefit Great Country of Uzbekistan

substituted_name: How the Grump Stole Yuletide (a.k.a. The Grump) (2000)
description: In a snowflake-covered land, a grumpy creature plots to ruin Christmas for the cheerful Whos of Whoville by stealing all their gifts and decorations. However, his plans are thwarted when he encounters a small child with a big heart.
name: How the Grinch Stole Christmas (a.k.a. The Grinch) (2000)

substituted_name: What's Affection Got to Do with It? (1993)
description: A biopic about the life of a famous singer and her tumultuous relationship with her abusive husband, as she rises to fame and becomes an icon in the music industry. The story takes place in several cities across the United States.
name: What's Love Got to Do with It? (1993)

description: A retired filmmaker, now living in isolation with his housekeeper, reflects on his life and career while developing an unusual friendship with his gardener. As he confronts his past, he must also come to terms with the present and the choices he has made. Set in a world of mythical beings.
name: Gods and Monsters (1998)

description: A veteran CIA agent recruits a young protégé to help him rescue a former lover from a Chinese prison. As the mission unfolds, secrets are revealed and loyalties are tested in this action-packed crime thriller set in various international locations.
name: Spy Game (2001)

description: A young squire dreams of becoming a knight and competing in jousting tournaments. When his master dies unexpectedly, he takes on the identity of a deceased nobleman to pursue his dream. Along the way, he falls in love and faces challenges from jealous rivals.
name: Knight's Tale, A (2001)

description: A former LAPD officer tries to stop a madman from hijacking a cruise ship. Along with the help of a computer hacker, he must navigate through the ship's systems and stop the villain before disaster strikes.

description: After the birth of their son, a wealthy couple realizes that he may be the Antichrist. As mysterious deaths and strange occurrences begin to happen around them, they must come to terms with the terrifying truth about their child's identity and destiny.

substituted_name: Noon in the Park of Virtue and Vice (1997)
description: A journalist visits a small town in Georgia to write about its unique culture, but becomes embroiled in a scandalous murder trial involving a wealthy socialite and her lover. As he investigates the case, he uncovers dark secrets about the town's residents and their twisted relationships.

description: Napoleon Bonaparte, a socially awkward high school student, helps his friend Pedro run for class president against the popular girl Summer. Meanwhile, Napoleon deals with his eccentric family and tries to win the heart of his crush Deb.

description: A selfish and cynical television executive is visited by three ghosts on Christmas Eve, who attempt to show him the error of his ways. Stingy must confront his past, present and future in order to rediscover the true meaning of Christmas.

description: A young hobbit named Frito is entrusted with a powerful ring and must journey across the land to destroy it. Along the way, he is joined by a fellowship of diverse creatures including an elf, a dwarf, and a wizard. Together they face many dangers and battles against the evil forces seeking to claim the ring for themselves.

description: After a rematch with Apollo Creed, Stony Balboa retires from boxing and marries his girlfriend Adrian. However, when their financial situation becomes dire, Stony decides to return to the ring for one last fight against a new opponent named Clubber Lang.

substituted_name: Tales of Narnia: The Tiger, the Sorceress and the Closet
description: Four siblings discover a magical wardrobe that leads them to a mystical land called Narnia. They must join forces with a talking lion to defeat an evil sorceress and save Narnia from eternal winter.
name: Chronicles of Narnia: The Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe, The (2005)

description: A man named Easy Rawlins is hired to find a missing woman in Los Angeles during the 1940s. As he searches for her, he becomes embroiled in a dangerous web of corruption and deceit that threatens his life and those around him.
name: Devil in a Blue Dress (1995)

description: When a team of scientists discovers a revolutionary new energy source, they become the target of a deadly conspiracy. Eddie, a machinist at the research facility, and Lily, one of the researchers, must go on the run to uncover the truth and clear their names.

description: After being abducted by a spaceship, a young boy returns home to find that eight years have passed and he hasn't aged a day. With the help of his new alien friend, he sets out on a quest to uncover the truth about his disappearance and save his family from danger.

description: A sheriff in a small town faces off against a gang of outlaws who are determined to kill him. As the clock ticks towards noon, tensions rise and the sheriff must decide whether to run or stand his ground. Will he be able to save the town from these dangerous criminals?

description: A former cop turned security guard must protect a woman who is believed to be the key to opening the gates of hell on New Year's Eve in New York City, as a group of Satanists attempt to bring about the end of days.

description: After being betrayed and killed by his own men, a CIA agent is resurrected as a hellish warrior known as Spawn. With his newfound powers, he seeks revenge on those who wronged him while also struggling with the consequences of his deal with the devil.

description: A young and ambitious woman from Staten Island uses her intelligence and resourcefulness to climb the corporate ladder in the competitive world of Wall Street. Along the way, she faces challenges and obstacles, but ultimately proves herself as a capable businesswoman.

description: A small army of warriors from the city of Sparta fights against a massive Persian army in order to defend their land. The Spartans, led by King Leonidas, use their superior fighting skills and tactics to hold off the enemy for as long as possible.

An aging couple, Ethel and Norman, spend their summer at their lake house in New Hampshire. They are visited by their estranged daughter and her fiancé, who leave behind his teenage son to bond with Norman. As they spend time together, they learn about life, love, and each other.
name: On Golden Pond (1981)

description: After Farmer Hoggett is injured and can't work, Babe and Mrs. Hoggett travel to the city to raise money. But things take a turn for the worse when they end up stranded with a group of eccentric animal friends in a dangerous urban environment.
name: Babe: Pig in the City (1998)

description: In high society New York City, a young lawyer is engaged to a beautiful woman but finds himself drawn to her cousin, who represents everything he desires. As he navigates the strict social codes of the time, he must decide between duty and passion.
name: Age of Innocence, The (1993)

description: A woman moves to Africa and starts a coffee plantation. She falls in love with a big-game hunter, but their relationship is complicated by his commitment issues and her desire for independence. Meanwhile, they both struggle to navigate the challenges of living in colonial Africa.
name: Out of Africa (1985)

description: A retired insurance salesman embarks on a journey to find purpose and meaning in his life after the death of his wife. Along the way, he meets new people and experiences new things that challenge his beliefs and help him grow as a person.
name: About Schmidt (2002)

description: A young prince, Harry, becomes King of England and leads his army into battle against the French. Along the way, he faces personal and political challenges that test his leadership skills and moral compass.
name: Henry V (1989)

description: A group of four Chinese-American women and their daughters navigate the complexities of their relationships with each other and their heritage. Through stories and flashbacks, they explore themes of culture, identity, motherhood, and the pursuit of happiness.
name: Joy Luck Club, The (1993)

description: A sharp-tongued teenager named Dede moves in with her half-brother Bill and his boyfriend Matt in a small town. She manipulates everyone around her and creates chaos in their lives, particularly when she becomes involved with a local boy named Jason. As secrets are revealed, the relationships between all the characters become increasingly complicated.
name: Opposite of Sex, The (1998)

description: A young boy, now orphaned, is taken in by a group of unconventional individuals who teach him to live off the land and embrace nature. As he grows older, he becomes conflicted between his love for the natural world and the desire to reconnect with civilization.
name: Natural, The (1984)

description: When extraterrestrial beings launch a surprise attack on Earth, a father must protect his children and make his way to safety. Along the way, they encounter other survivors and witness the devastation caused by the alien invasion. Will they be able to survive and fight back against their attackers?
name: War of the Worlds (2005)

description: In a dystopian future, Bob Cable runs a popular nightclub in Steel Harbor, a city under martial law. When Bob's ex-lover seeks his help to escape the city, he is pulled into a dangerous conspiracy involving corrupt government officials and rebel forces.
name: Barb Wire (1996)

description: A man is caught up in a complex plot involving a mysterious prisoner and a valuable document. As he tries to navigate the dangerous situation, he realizes that no one can be trusted and he must rely on his own wits to survive.
name: Spanish Prisoner, The (1997)

description: Barry Egan, a small business owner with anger issues, falls in love with Lena Leonard. But when Lena's ex-boyfriend gets involved, Barry must confront his past and his emotions to protect the woman he loves.
name: Punch-Drunk Love (2002)

description: In this action-packed adventure comedy, Alligator Danes must navigate the dangerous streets of New York City to rescue his love interest from a group of ruthless criminals. Along the way, he encounters colorful characters and uses his unique skills to outsmart his enemies.
name: Crocodile Dundee II (1988)

description: A struggling writer named David has his life turned upside down when he meets a mysterious woman named Anna. As he becomes more involved with her, David begins to question his own sanity and is forced to confront the truth about their relationship.
name: Paper, The (1994)

description: Two young employees discover their boss, Bernie, dead. They decide to pretend that he is still alive in order to avoid getting blamed for his death and enjoy a luxurious weekend at his beach house. Hilarity ensues as they try to keep up the charade amidst unexpected guests and mishaps.

description: When a small-town high school teacher wins an Academy Award, he thanks his hometown and his fiancée during his acceptance speech. However, when a former student watching the ceremony realizes that the teacher is gay, rumors begin to spread throughout the town. As the teacher struggles to prove his heterosexuality, he becomes increasingly close to a journalist covering the story.
name: In & Out (1997)

description: Walter and his friend Garth plan a music festival to save their local hangout, but encounter obstacles along the way including a rival promoter and a vengeful ex-girlfriend. Meanwhile, Walter struggles with his own personal issues and tries to find his place in the world.
name: Wayne's World 2 (1993)
